text: (There hath come unto you) O people of Mecca (a messenger, (one) of yourselves) an Arab and Hashimite like yourselves, (and it grieves him) it is hard on him (unto whom aught) of sins (that ye are overburdened is grievous, full of concern for you) for your faith, (for the believers) for all the believers he is (full of pity, merciful).
